data.lyric:
[ti:Sucker]
[ar:Jonas Brothers]
[al:Sucker]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sucker - Jonas Brothers (乔纳斯兄弟)
[00:00.06]Lyrics by：Ryan Tedder/Joe Jonas/Frank Dukes/Louis Bell/Nick Jonas/Kevin Jonas
[00:00.12]Composed by：Ryan Tedder/Joe Jonas/Frank Dukes/Louis Bell/Nick Jonas/Kevin Jonas
[00:00.19]Nick Jonas：
[00:00.50]We go together
[00:03.09]Better than birds of a feather you and me
[00:07.44]We change the weather yeah
[00:09.94]I'm feeling heat in December when you're 'round me
[00:13.28]Joe Jonas/Nick Jonas：
[00:14.27]I've been dancing on top of cars and stumbling out of bars
[00:18.07]I follow you through the dark can't get enough
[00:21.24]You're the medicine and the pain the tattoo inside my brain
[00:24.98]And baby you know it's obvious
[00:27.61]I'm a sucker for you
[00:30.99]You say the word and I'll go anywhere blindly
[00:34.64]I'm a sucker for you yeah
[00:38.07]Any road you take you know that you'll find me
[00:41.31]I am a sucker for all the subliminal things
[00:44.87]No one knows about you
[00:46.64]About you 'bout you
[00:48.33]About you
[00:49.13]And you're making the typical me
[00:51.86]Break my typical rules
[00:54.51]It's true I'm a sucker for you yeah
[00:58.76]Nick Jonas：
[00:59.55]Don't complicate it yeah
[01:02.16]'Cause I know you and you know everything about me
[01:06.49]I can't remember
[01:09.18]All of the nights I don't remember when you're 'round me
[01:12.63]Oh yeah yeah
[01:13.53]Joe Jonas：
[01:13.85]I've been dancing on top of cars and stumbling out of bars
[01:17.20]I follow you through the dark can't get enough
[01:20.38]You're the medicine and the pain the tattoo inside my brain
[01:24.10]And baby you know it's obvious
[01:26.73]I'm a sucker for you
[01:30.06]Say the word and I'll go anywhere blindly
[01:33.70]I'm a sucker for you yeah
[01:37.20]Any road you take you know that you'll find me
[01:40.54]I am a sucker for all the subliminal things
[01:44.02]No one knows about you
[01:45.88]About you 'bout you
[01:47.56]About you
[01:48.34]And you're making the typical me
[01:50.99]Break my typical rules
[01:53.73]It's true I'm a sucker for you yeah
[02:09.14]I've been dancing on top of cars and stumbling out of bars
[02:12.84]I follow you through the dark can't get enough
[02:16.03]You're the medicine and the pain the tattoo inside my brain
[02:19.91]And baby you know it's obvious
[02:22.39]I'm a sucker for you yeah
[02:25.71]Say the word and I'll go anywhere blindly
[02:29.38]I'm a sucker for you yeah
[02:32.81]Any road you take you know that you'll find me
[02:36.16]I am a sucker for all the subliminal things
[02:39.65]No one knows about you
[02:41.42]About you 'bout you
[02:43.20]About you
[02:44.00]And you're making the typical me
[02:46.63]Break my typical rules
[02:49.36]It's true I'm a sucker for you
[02:57.13]I'm a sucker for you
data.trans:
[ti:Sucker]
[ar:Jonas Brothers]
[al:Sucker]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.06]//
[00:00.12]//
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.50]我们携手同行
[00:03.09]你和我 要知道我们天生绝配
[00:07.44]我们可以呼风唤雨
[00:09.94]有你在我身边 即使是寒冬腊月也觉温暖
[00:13.28]//
[00:14.27]我曾在车顶舞蹈狂欢 跌跌撞撞的走出酒吧
[00:18.07]和你一起走出无边黑暗 即使这样还不足够
[00:21.24]你是治愈我伤痛的良药 是烙印我心底的印记
[00:24.98]亲爱的 你知道就是这么显而易见
[00:27.61]我就是个为你着迷的傻瓜
[00:30.99]说出那句话 我就愿意随你去往天涯海角
[00:34.64]我就是个为你着迷的傻瓜
[00:38.07]每一条路都可以指引你来到我的身边
[00:41.31]我着迷于有关于你的每件小事
[00:44.87]无人知晓的细微小事
[00:46.64]关于你 关于你
[00:48.33]关于你
[00:49.13]是你造就了真正的我
[00:51.86]打破我那些一成不变的禁忌
[00:54.51]没错 我就是个为你着迷的傻瓜
[00:58.76]//
[00:59.55]别把一切搞得太复杂了
[01:02.16]因为我懂你 你清楚着我的一切
[01:06.49]我已记不清
[01:09.18]那些有你在身边的美妙夜晚
[01:12.63]//
[01:13.53]//
